lead_paragraph: Brian David Mitchell, a former street preacher on trial for kidnapping and assaulting Elizabeth Smart, apparently suffered a seizure in court Tuesday.
snippet: Brian David Mitchell, a former street preacher on trial for kidnapping and assaulting Elizabeth Smart, apparently suffered a seizure in court Tuesday.

headline.main: Utah: Defendant Has Seizure in Court
